DOC.detailed_description: Objective : ass efficacy pain level steroid injection inter-vertebral disc patient chronic back pain MODIC I discopathy MRI Methods : multicenter double blind randomize control trial Setting : 3 tertiary care hospital France Patients : 134 patient disable chronic low back pain relieve usual recommend treatment MODIC I ( inflammatory ) discopathy MRI Intervention : Injection 25 mg methylprednisolone inter-vertebral disc discography ( intervention group , 67 patient ) discography alone ( control group , 67 patient ) Outcome measure : The primary outcome measure pain level assess 11-point numeric scale ( 0-100 ) 1 month . Success define less 40 pain numeric scale 1 month . Secondary outcome measure pain level 12 month , Disability ( Quebec questionnaire ) , quality life ( SF-12 ) 1 12 month , anxiety depression ( HAD ) , analgesics anti-inflammatory last week , return work , assessment disability 1 12 month disc inflammation ( MRI ) 12 month . Tolerance adverse effect record . Trial duration : 36 month ( 24 month inclusion 12 month follow-up ) Follow-up visit : 1 , 3 , 6 , 12 month Statistical analysis : intention treat
